name: github action dashboard
description: A dashboard to display all Actions of a organisation or user

GITHUB_ORG.description: Github Organisation, Only one is valid. If both are specified GITHUB_ORG takes precedence and the GITHUB_USERNAME is ignored.

GITHUB_APPID.description: The AppId from the GitHub App general settings page.

GITHUB_APP_PRIVATEKEY.description: The base64 encoded private key from the GitHub App general settings page.

GITHUB_APP_CLIENTSECRET.description: The client secret from the GitHub App general settings page.

GITHUB_APP_INSTALLATIONID.description: Installation id that can be retrieved using steps in the next section.

GITHUB_APP_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Optional. If you don't supply the dashboard will not setup webhooks and only update every 15 minutes.

DEBUG.description: action-dashboard:* - Optional setting to help in debugging
